text: RWBY (pronounced "Ruby")Rooster Teeth Podcast is an American anime web series created by Monty Oum for Rooster Teeth. It follows four girls who live in the supernatural world of Remnant and fight monsters called Grimm. Eight seasons have been uploaded on Rooster Teeth's website. A Japanese dub of RWBY is distributed in Japan by Warner Bros. and airs on Japanese TV, making it the first American-made anime be shown on in Japan. ==References== Category:2013 American television series debuts Category:2013 anime television series .
title: RWBY
